Plot: Leonor, a widow in a small South American town, gives birth to Charlotte, a dwarf. The mother not only provides a rich childhood for her daughter, she erases any clues her daughter might ...
Title: I Don't Want to Talk About It
Writer: María Luisa Bemberg, Jorge Goldenberg (dialogue), Julio Llinás (story), Aldo Romero (script)
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Luisina Brando, Alejandra Podesta, Betiana Blum
